features: CLEANSE & REFRESH: Wash away heavy build up to leave hair and scalp refreshed
NOURISH: Shea butter formula helps reduce breakage & nourish hair
GREAT FOR: Type 2 waves, Type 3 curls, & Type 4 coils
NO HARSH INGREDIENTS: formulated with no mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, alcohol, paraffin or propylene
CRUELTY-FREE: absolutely no testing on animals
body.description: Do wash day the right way with Cantu Shea Butter for Natural Hair Sulfate-Free Cleansing Cream Shampoo 13.5 fl oz! Crafted with an award-winning blend of pure shea butter and essential oils, the Cleansing Cream Shampoo produces a rich lather that conditions as it cleanses, gently removing product buildup without drying out hair. For best results, apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair and work into a lather. Massage into the scalp, and rinse. Repeat as needed. Use it as part of your regular wash day routine alongside the Sulfate-Free Hydrating Cream Conditioner. This sulfate-free shampoo was formulated without harsh ingredients like mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, paraffin, or propylene. Since the beginning, you’ve pushed us to advance skin and hair science to honor your locs, your curls, your waves, your braids, your natural. At Cantu, we support your journey with care and we celebrate all the styles you rock!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your coils, waves, curls, locs, and braids will love the hydrating and nourishing ingredients with Cantu For Natural Hair Collection formulated with powerful essential oils and pure shea butter. Find everything your hair needs to condition, style, and strengthen with Cantu. Each product in this collection has been curated and specially developed to care for your hair; leaving it softer, stronger, and more protected than ever against breakage and damage. You deserve to look even more gorgeous and glowing and ready to take on the day!

Infused with enriching ingredients like shea butter, castor oil, and jojoba oil, we designed this collection with coils and waves in mind. Moisturize, nourish, and shape your natural curls to get the look you deserve. Enjoy hair care formulated for your lifestyle and designed to fit seamlessly into your hair care routine We believe holistic care isn’t just part of a good hair care routine. At Cantu, we extend holistic care to our communities. This means empowering young women of color to become the entrepreneurs and leaders of the future. It means supplying Black and Latina women with the resources to follow their ambition fiercely. Because everyone deserves to be their most confident self. We know how important the ingredients of your hair care routine are to you. That’s why we make sure to include no harsh ingredients in our formulas, so you can feel confident, secure, and cared for when you wear your natural hair with Cantu. Our products are specially formulated to give your locs, curls, coils, waves, and braids the extra love & attention they deserve. Our nuanced formulas are created with your confidence and curls health in mind, and with absolutely no testing on animals.

LEAVE-IN CONDITIONING CREAM COCONUT CURLING CREAM COMEBACK CURL NEXT DAY CURL REVITALIZER MOISTURIZING TWIST & LOCK GEL CLEANSING SHAMPOO RINSE-OUT CONDITIONER APPLICATION TYPE Cream Cream Spray Gel Cream Cream USE Treatment Treatment & styling Styling Styling Cleanse Condition Targets Dry, damaged hair Dry, brittle hair Full head Braids, twists & locs Full head Full Head REPLACES VITAL MOISTURE & PROMOTES STRONGER, HEALTHIER HAIR ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ INFUSED WITH Pure shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, jojoba seed oil, mango seed oil, macadamia oil, grapeseed oil, avocado oil, & argan oil Pure shea butter and coconut oil Pure shea butter & castor oil Pure shea butter, coconut oil, avocado oil, almond oil, jojoba seed oil, olive oil, mango seed oil, carrot seed oil, & grapeseed oil Pure shea butter Pure shea butter GREAT FOR Curls & coils Type 3 & type 4 curls & coils Curls & coils Curls & coils Waves, curls & coils Waves, curls & coils

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars * Dried my Hair MORE Than ANY Shampoo I've EVER Used * See Update *
reviews.reviewText: 2nd UPDATE: AFTER USING FOR 2 YEARS. I've completely changed my review and opinion on this product. I think this product has single handily saved my hair. I'm a white woman and I'm 68 years old & on several medications. Several years ago my hair started thinning & falling out. I stopped using any type of hair coloring year ago, because of sever allergies. my hair was pretty much entirely white. MY hair is nearly waist long now, (have to keep it in a pony tail). My hair will never be as thick as when I was young, but all the balder spots on my head and thinner areas have filled in and my hair has gone back to blond and is shiny (as shiny as it can be). People that haven't seen me for a while keep telling me I look a lot younger, since I started coloring my hair again. But, I haven't. What, I have done is replace all my other products with this. I still use my medicated prescription shampoo once a week, but that dries my hair really bad. (I have seborreic dermatitis, so I have to use that shampoo) Then, I put this on. Leave it on for 5 minutes and wash it out. I follow with cool water for about a minute. I know that's not how it;s supposed to be done, but that's how I do it & it's worked for me. It's both cleaned & conditioned my hair & scalp & I get a very small amount of hair in the drain, if any. I might also add that I have straight hair, not curly or wavy. In my opinion, this could be used for different hair types. What you see below, are my previous reviews of this product. Whenever I find that a product is worse or better than I originally thought, I try to note that. Sometimes you don't know how well something actually works, until you've used it awhile.* OK, originally I had given this a one star rating, but I've changed that. My sister had purchased some too, so I tried it again. This actually has worked somewhat for me, but I've had to make some modifications to it. Like What??? I've found that this can actually make my hair soft, if I wet my hair with warm water, massage this in, leave it a few minutes, rinse it out and then follow with a good sulfate free shampoo. Wait, this is a shampoo!! Yes, but there are ingredients in this that just weigh my hair down too much and I believe the weighing it down and buildup is what's causing the dryness and breakage. I "do not" follow with a conditioner. This actually has enough conditioner in it. I think that was my mistake before. I was following this, with the conditioner. MISTAKE!! At least for me, it was. But, working this into my hair and scalp well, leaving it for a few minutes, rinsing and then following with a good sulfate free shampoo. left my hair, clean, soft & shiny for 4 days. I'm happy with that. I can't give it higher stars, because I couldn't get those results as instructed.ORIGINAL REVIEW:I've probably used a couple hundred shampoos in my 66 years and I can say without a doubt, even including the drying medicated shampoos, that this was the most drying shampoo I've ever used. My hair came out by me just touching it and that was BEFORE I was able to put any kind of conditioner on it. Even after the best conditioner I have, I still had hair loss, until I was able to get some good products on it and the hair breakage and loss stopped. My sister tried it on just a little bit of her hair and it did the exact same thing. I seriously don't know how anyone could honestly rate this higher than 1 or 2. It's cheap & smells good. That's not worth losing your hair over, when I've spent so much to keep it. It went straight to the trash.Thank you for reading my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, works well
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased this in prep for a spray tan, because the place I was having a spray tan done recommended sulfate free wash - and said she prefers to use shampoo. Instead of getting stuck with something I may never use again, I bought this. I love the smell and my hair always feels clean after using this! Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used this shampoo almost exclusively for years and will never go back to another. It's great and the price can't be beat. Great value and great for my hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good shampoo. Regular conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Shampoo is thick, has a nice lather and a nice smell when first applying. After rinsing out, the smell is gone, leaving hair smelling clean. I cannot attest to extra product removal since I don't use them often.Conditioner is light. I like to use conditioner to detangle my wet curls and this conditioner becomes foamy and lathers well when I comb through my hair. The foamy lather helps spread the conditioner after you apply a small amount towards ends of hair.The bottles look small but the amount inside decreases slower than I expected. I feel like my hair is healthier but I am not sure because I recently trimmed my split ends.If you are used to using many other products after washing, this may be a good option because of the clarifying shampoo and the light conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just received this today. My daughter introduced me to it. The shampoo leaves my hair feeling so clean and the conditioner is awesome! Every conditioner I have ever used weighed down my hair. Not this conditioner it is awesome. My hair is super soft without being weighed down! I would definitely recommend both!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I had gotten this shampoo as a trial size - I loved it so much that I bought the full sized bottle. I love the scent, natural ingredients and the gentle cleansing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gives great moisture for all hair textures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for curly hair!
reviews.reviewText: Cleans gently, and smells great! Buy with confidence!

Tiene un agradable aroma y me ha ayudado mucho a darle forma a mi cabello (apesar de ser el único producto especial para rizos que uso por el momento), en definitiva lo volveré a comprar (llevo usándolo más de un mes y en lo personal ví resultados desde la primera semana, quizás no muy significativos pero después de un tiempo el resultado mejora mucho sobretodo si usas el método curly y seguramente sería mejor el resultado si usará algún otro de los productos de cantú o si usará algún otro producto para rizos)

Given the state of another product I ordered in the same day and opened first; I assumed that this product would arrived cracked and damaged. I am thankful for the person who sealed the container and packaged it with protection so it was not busted open like the other product we purchased.We like cantu products, suits our hair needs.
Been using it for a year it never failed me, keeps my hair in good health and my scalp clean
Perfect for curly hair very hydrating and easy to comb
Leaves hair really greasy and limp
